summary: Box-Closure approach analysis: BoxClosure (formulas where Box chi is in ALL families) provides exactly what K-distribution needs. Key insight: BoxClosure = UnionBoxContent for singleton bundles. Main challenge is proving MutuallyCoherent preservation when extending with witnesses. WeakCoherentBundle alternative proposed as simpler path. Estimated 60-100 hours for full axiom elimination.

artifacts.summary: Deep analysis of Box-Closure approach for multi-family witness consistency, including complete construction flow, Lean implementation strategy, and WeakCoherentBundle alternative
